entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts who is known for being cold and strict. He is also the Potions master and a member of the Order of the Phoenix.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The main antagonist, a powerful wizard who is the leader of the Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Snape is teaching Occlumency to Harry, as mentioned in the conversation.
Harry has visions and dreams about the Dark Lord, which Snape is trying to understand.
